--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  The TRF schematics--hopefully it makes sense.  The antenna coil core for
> the MK484 is from a junker AM radio--the larger the better. You can add a
> ten turn secondary coil to the antenna core, to couple in an external
> antenna wire. The external antenna really helps with the TRF radio.  The
> varactor diodes can be scavenged from an old car tuner--if ya know what to
> look for. Or get the NTE618 from  mouser.com, I think it was
> electonics123(on line) that had the MK484, everything else can be had at
> Radio shack.
> 
>  F-S
